text:
testing testing one two three can you
hear us

hello there hi everybody its mr. Duncan
and mr. Steve mr. Steve is with me we

are now on our little trip our mystery
tour that mr. Steve has taken me on

because today is my birthday August the
12 2019 is my birthday I am another

another year older oh my goodness how
old am i I'm not telling you you should

never ask a lady her age so we are now
in a beautiful place in South Wales

called Brecon so we are very close to a
place called Brecon which is near a

group of mountains called the Brecon
Beacons and it is a very scenic place

right behind me there is a wonderful
river you might be able to hear it in

the background there is the most amazing
river flowing behind me let's have a

quick look there it is
can you see right behind me there is a

lovely river bubbling away and we have
had to find shelter

haven't we Steve we have yes it's a bit
cold isn't it mr. Duncan down by the

river it must be about 10 degrees cooler
down here it's quite windy you might you

might have to get closest to the
microphone yes speaking yes it's not

that warm today I'll be honest with you
chilly it's a big river and all the wind

is blowing off it and cooling the air it
doesn't feel like a summers day it feels

very cold about 17 degrees today but the
Sun is out so I'm not complaining and

mr. Steve has has treated you treated me
to a lovely stay here in the Brecon

Beacons interesting vegan South Wales
thank you mr. Steve for my lovely gift

thank you and also he's bought me some
other things as well for my birthday

which I might show you next weekend so
we're not

live for those wondering we are not
doing a live stream at the moment not

now at this moment this is recorded but
we will be back live on Saturday and

also Sunday as well as usual I won't be
because as you well know I've been

kicked off the live stream we have
sacked mr. Steve everyone thinks that I

sacked you actually it's not strictly
true no I just said I didn't want to do

them anymore for a while and I just
meant I just wanted a bit of a break

that's it but Mr Duncan interpreted that
interpreted that I added an extra

syllable there for the word mr. Duncan
interpreted it they did they did

interpreted interpreted that as meaning
I didn't want to leave him at all in

fact I actually do quite miss it I got
no tearful when I'm not doing the live

streams but it was you that said you
didn't want to do them anymore anyway

it's my birthday let's not make things
all unhappy we're happy I might have to

take mr. Steve to the river and drown
him you might never see him ever again

there's no one else around here it's
just us I know I could commit the

perfect crime right now well you'd have
to destroy your phone and all the

recording of this event on it well I do
all I can do is just to raise this and

and never post it to YouTube the perfect
crime it's like Columbo it is have you

got a map Steve yes I've got a map here
because where we are staying they have a

notable collection of trees yes a tree
collection frankly I've never stayed

anywhere that actually has a collection
of trees and there you can see mr. Steve

is now showing you a wonderful map there
down it is a map no it's not upside down

now surely you can tell if it's upside
down the writing looks back-to-front mr.

Duncan yes that's because we're looking
on a mobile phone device tree walk so

there we go we can go now no one can
hear Steve now we should go around this

walk tomorrow
and we will look at all the different

species of tree yes oh and also tomorrow
we are going out on some electric

bicycles have you seen have you seen
them they are electric bikes so you can

pedal with your feet but also the bike
will help you to navigate those steep

hills especially for old people like us
you see because we're getting older

because of course it's my birthday today
and I'm another year older we are coming

up to five minutes mr. Steve say goodbye
goodbye and I will see you later this is

mr. Duncan in the Brecon Beacons on his
birthday saying...
ta ta for now  8-)
